events.comment: One text object to change them all using a function...

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Phenomena
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Includes one text object with assigned variable id's to modify the displayed text and styles for different link states (passive, hover, active). You can have any number of items by copying an instance and changing the id variable. Just don't forget to add the links for them as well.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Menus

eventsFunctions.description: Handle the interaction with the menu items.
eventsFunctions.name: MainMenu
eventsFunctions.sentence: Handle the interactions with the menu using _PARAM1_.

events.comment:
Only edit the text object itself to change the font style or default formatting. 
Making most of the changes through events offers more options and flexibility.
Change the displayed text according to the object variable named "id".
Change the scene, visit a website, show or hide layers...whatever the text button should do on click, put it here
Change the text style depending on link state
*** Hover *** We turn the shadow into a glow so it seems to 'light up' on mouseover.
*** Passive *** Just waiting to be rolled over or clicked.
*** Active *** Make the link look different if it is for the current scene.
